body.name: iPhone Charger 3pack 10FT Apple MFi Certified Long Lightning Cable Fast Charging High Speed Data Sync USB Cable Compatible iPhone 14 13/12/11 Pro Max/XS MAX/XR/XS/X/8/7/Plus/6S (Grey White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs
features: ● [MFI CERTIFIED] Apple MFi certified Lightning Cable is guaranteed not to pop up warning messages, ensuring your Lightning devices load and charge safely and quickly at the fastest possible speed.

● [QUICK CHARGE & DATA TRANSMISSION] The high-quality four-core iPhone copper wire improves the charging and data transmission speed of the iPhone charging cable. Our iPhone charger technology ensures faster charging times while ensuring that your device is completely safe.

● [DURABLE DESIGN] The iPhone charging cable is designed with a reinforced connector that has been tested to over 15,000 bends for extra protection and durability. This iPhone cable is more durable, stronger, and softer than normal iPhone charger cables, without tangling. Withstand all kinds of daily connection needs and long-term use.

● [MASSIVE COMPATIBILITY] USB-A to Lightning iPhone charger cable compatible with iPhone 13 Pro/13/ iPhone 12Pro/ 12 / iPhone 11 pro / 11 iphone xr /iphone xs / xs max /iphone x / iPhone 8 / 8 Plus, iPhone 7 / 7 Plus, iPhone 6s Plus / 6s / 6 Plus / 6 / iPhone 5s / 5c / 5 / SE and more.

● [QUALITY SERVICE] Only if you purchase our product can you receive a 12 month warranty period,In this time, if you have any questions about the product, please feel free to contact us. Our service team will provide you with a satisfactory solution within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Made of high-quality materials Superior craftsmanship is mainly the use of superior materials. This charging cable uses high-purity and thicker copper wire, which makes the transmission and charging more stable. For iPhones, stable charging is very beneficial to battery life. Fast charging and transferring data To reduce cable resistance and increase charging speed, high-quality four-core copper wire is used internally, so in most cases, your device can charge at 2.4 amps and transfer files at 480Mbps. Sturdy and wear-resistant This charging cable is covered with nylon braided fiber material, which makes it stronger and more durable. Not easily damaged when pulled, folded, bent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Chargers I’ve Ordered
reviews.reviewText: I recently stumbled upon these chargers and thought it was a good deal to get 3 of them for one price. I have no negative this to say about them!!!! They charge very fast, don’t get overheated, are flexible and most importantly reach across my entire bed. They’re very useful and reliable and I would 10/10 purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and good Value
reviews.reviewText: I loved my chargers, it’s the best value with pack of three , they are long, fast, and most important to me is sturdy cuz my cats like to eat wires. Thank you! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My teenagers constantly loose their cell phone charging cords and they want to use mine! So, I decided to order them all new charging cords for Christmas. I love that there were multiple cords in one pack for a good price. These were delivered quickly. They are heavy duty braided and long! My kids love that they can plug in and have plenty of cord to move around their room. These charge quickly and overall just seem to be good quality. Pleased and would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked well. Charged i-phone fairly fast.
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for my daughter, so of course she needed it right away. Came the next morning and worked well. Charged phone fairly fast and was long enough. Seems to be made well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and value
reviews.reviewText: We received our order promptly. I was hesitant not ordering an Apple product, but, these definitely do the job. Fast charging and long enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent charger, Great Price!
reviews.reviewText: I was in need of an additional phone charger; my teenager's charger failed and was constantly asking to use mine. Saw these listed at a great price for a pack of three. Delivered next day and put to use immediately, really liked the fast charge and the length allowed me to plug in a distance away from my desk. My teen also put to use and loved the as they were able to use in bed or move around without having to use an extension cord. Quality seems excellent, braided and flexible. If I need any more chargers, would definitely buy this product again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems sturdy. Plug stays in easily. Love the length
reviews.reviewText: all 3 worked perfect right off the bat. The corded design is way better and more durable than the usual plastic versions. Would totally get again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great, but not as thick as I expected
reviews.reviewText: Great cable, works great, and looks nice.I had expected them to be a little thicker. The braided cover is nice and allows them to move around easily as opposed to rubber that hangs up on everything.Great cables for the price. Would buy again.
